overview.dialog.welcome.title: Welcome to the Enchantment Editor!
overview.dialog.welcome.body: This page lets you manage the pack's enchantments. You can add, edit, and delete enchantments.
overview.dialog.welcome.list.1: You can disable an enchantment using the purple button at the top right of the enchantment.
overview.dialog.welcome.list.2: Access the configurator with the bottom button.
overview.dialog.toolbar.title: The Toolbar
overview.dialog.toolbar.body: At the bottom of Voxel, you'll find the toolbar. It lets you search, sort, and change the view of enchantments.
overview.dialog.toolbar.list.1: Quickly find the enchantment you're looking for.
overview.dialog.toolbar.list.2: Easily view and sort important information.
overview.dialog.advanced.title: Advanced Features
overview.dialog.advanced.body: When in grouped view, you can drag and drop enchantments from one group to another to quickly modify them.
overview.dialog.advanced.list.1.after: drag to another group to assign it the same exclusive set.
overview.dialog.advanced.list.2.after: drag to another group to assign it the same supported items.
overview.dialog.advanced.list.3.after: drag to another group to assign it the same activation slot.
overview.title: Overview
overview.sort.supported.label: Supported Items
overview.sort.exclusive.label: Non Combinable
overview.sort.slots.label: Slots
overview.sort.none.label: View All
overview.sort.slots.description: Group by slots (when the effect activates)
overview.sort.supported.section: Enchantments are grouped by their supported items.
overview.sort.exclusive.section: Enchantments are grouped by their exclusive sets (non-combinable).
overview.sort.slots.section: Enchantments are grouped by their activation slots.
overview.enchanting_table: This enchantment can be found on an enchanting table
overview.chest: This enchantment can be found in chests
overview.tradeable: This enchantment can be traded by villagers like a book
overview.tradeable_equipment: This enchantment can be traded by villagers like an item
overview.price_doubled: The price of the trade is doubled
overview.sort.none.section: These enchantments do not match any sorting criteria.
section.slots.description: When the enchantment effect should be activated.
section.supported.description: Which items are compatible with this enchantment.
global.maxLevel.title: Maximum level
global.maxLevel.description: The maximum level of the enchantment.
global.weight.title: Weight
global.weight.description: The rarity of the enchantment in the enchantment table.
global.anvilCost.title: Anvil cost
global.anvilCost.description: The cost of combining two items with this enchantment.
global.minCostBase.title: Minimum base cost
global.minCostPerLevelAboveFirst.title: Minimum cost per level above the first
global.maxCostBase.title: Maximum base cost
global.maxCostPerLevelAboveFirst.title: Maximum cost per level above the first
global.mode.title: Mode
global.mode.description: Choose between Normal (default), Soft Delete (Deactivates effects and obtaining) or Only Creative (Obtained only in creative).
global.explanation.title: Detailed explanations of the different components
global.explanation.list.1: Sets the maximum level of the enchantment, the effect values automatically adapt to the levels.
global.explanation.list.2: The higher this value is, the more often the enchantment will appear in the enchanting table.
global.explanation.list.3: The cost to apply this enchantment to another item using an anvil. Divided by two if using a book, multiplied by the enchantment level.

find.enchantingTable.title: Enchanting Table
find.enchantingTable.description: This enchantment can be obtained from the enchanting table.
find.mobEquipment.title: Mob Equipment
find.mobEquipment.description: This enchantment can be found on mob equipment.
find.lootInChests.title: Loot in Chests
find.lootInChests.description: This enchantment can be found on naturally generated equipment in chests or other rewards.
find.tradeable.title: Tradeable
find.tradeable.description: This enchantment can be sold by villagers as an enchanted book.
find.tradeableEquipment.title: Tradeable Equipment
find.tradeableEquipment.description: This enchantment can be sold by villagers on equipment.
find.priceDoubled.title: The price is doubled
find.priceDoubled.description: This enchantment is charged twice as much in villager trades.
technical.curse.title: Curse
technical.curse.description: This enchantment will have a red description and cannot be removed with a grindstone
technical.nonTreasure.title: Non-treasure
technical.nonTreasure.description: Used in loot tables like fishing junk, certain structures, etc.
technical.treasure.title: Treasure
technical.treasure.description: Used in loot tables like fishing rewards.
technical.smeltsLoot.title: Smelts loot
technical.smeltsLoot.description: Items dropped by mobs will be smelted.
technical.preventBeeSpawning.title: Prevent bees from spawning when breaking hive
technical.preventBeeSpawning.description: The hive will not spawn bees when broken, and bees will be included in the block data.
technical.preventPotShattering.title: Prevent decorated pots from shattering
technical.preventPotShattering.descripti: Decorated pots will not break when broken with a tool or projectile.
technical.preventsIceMelting.title: Prevents ice from melting
technical.preventsIceMelting.description: Ice will not turn into water when broken
technical.preventInfestedBlockSpawning.d: Infested blocks will not spawn silverfish.
technical.lock.reason: Enabled by "no treasure" in technical settings
technical.effects.title: Enchantment effects
exclusive.custom.fallback: Does not contain any custom enchantment lists.
exclusive.set.armor.title: Armor Set
exclusive.set.armor.description: Contains all exclusive enchantments for armor.
exclusive.set.bow.title: Bow Set
exclusive.set.bow.description: Contains all exclusive enchantments for bows.
exclusive.set.crossbow.title: Crossbow Set
exclusive.set.crossbow.description: Contains all exclusive enchantments for crossbows.
exclusive.set.damage.title: Damage Set
exclusive.set.damage.description: Contains all exclusive enchantments for damage.
exclusive.set.mining.title: Mining Set
exclusive.set.mining.description: Contains all exclusive enchantments for mining.
exclusive.set.riptide.title: Riptide Set
exclusive.set.riptide.description: Contains all exclusive enchantments for Riptide.
exclusive.set.boots.title: Boots Set
exclusive.set.boots.description: Contains all exclusive enchantments for boots.
exclusive.vanilla.title: Vanilla
exclusive.custom.title: Custom
toggle.supported.title: Supported
toggle.supported.description: Items on which this enchantment can be applied, including anvil, /enchant command, or in reward.
toggle.primary.title: Enchanting Table
toggle.primary.description: Items for which this enchantment appears in an enchanting table. If set to 'Default', equals the option chosen in 'Supported'.
toggle.group.title: Predefined Group
toggle.group.description: 'Predefined Groups' are lists of enchantments that don't combine together. These are great if you're using other mods or datapacks since they can add their own enchantments to these lists too.
toggle.individual.title: Arbitrary Choice
toggle.individual.description: 'Arbitrary Choice' lets you choose exactly which enchantments shouldn't combine together, one by one.
slots.mainhand.title: Main Hand
slots.mainhand.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped in the main hand.
slots.offhand.title: Off Hand
slots.offhand.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped in the offhand.
slots.head.title: Head
slots.head.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped in the head.
slots.chest.title: Chest
slots.chest.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped in the chest.
slots.legs.title: Legs
slots.legs.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped in the legs.
slots.feet.title: Feet
slots.feet.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped in the feet.
slots.body.title: Body (Dog - Horse)
slots.body.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped on the body of a dog or horse.
slots.saddle.title: Saddle
slots.saddle.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped on the saddle.
slots.armor.title: Armor
slots.armor.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped on any armor piece.
slots.any.title: Any
slots.any.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped on any piece.
slots.hand.title: Hand
slots.hand.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped in the hand.
slots.hands.title: Hands
slots.hands.description: The effects will be activated when the item is equipped in the hands.
slots.explanation.title: Here's how enchantment slots work and when their effects kick in:
slots.explanation.list.1: Take Fire Aspect for example - if you put it on your main hand or offhand weapon, it'll set enemies on fire when you hit them.
slots.explanation.list.2: And if you put Fire Aspect on any armor piece (head, chest, legs or feet) and you equip it, it'll light up enemies every time you attack.
